Package lib.homies.framework.menu

Class AbstractHomiesMenu

java.lang.Object
lib.homies.framework.menu.AbstractHomiesMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
HomiesMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractPaginatedHomiesMenu
public abstract class AbstractHomiesMenu extends Object implements HomiesMenu
An abstract base class for implementing HomiesMenu. This class provides default empty implementations for event handlers (handleClick(HomiesPlayer, int), handleOpen(HomiesPlayer), handleClose(HomiesPlayer)), allowing subclasses to override only the methods they need. Subclasses are required to implement getTitle(HomiesPlayer), getSize(), and getItems(HomiesPlayer).

    • getItems

      public abstract Map<Integer,HomiesMenuItem> getItems(HomiesPlayer player)
      Description copied from interface: HomiesMenu
      Gets the map of menu items for the current state of the menu. The keys represent inventory slots, and values are the HomiesMenuItems.
      Specified by:
      getItems in interface HomiesMenu
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer viewing the menu.
      Returns:
      A map of slot to HomiesMenuItem.
